actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate the Big South Fork of the Cumberland River in the States of Kentucky and Tennessee as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Designates the Big South Fork of the Cumberland River in the States of Kentucky and Tennessee as a component of the national wild and scenic rivers system. Authorizes necessary appropriations to carry out the purpose of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Big South Fork of the Cumberland River in the States of Kentucky and Tennessee as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
